channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 12:41 Air Alarm to Poltava Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 12:41 Air Alarm to Poltava Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Poltava_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
